column1: #text=The first time I ever flew in an airplane was last summer .
#text=My mother and I bought tickets and had a direct flight from Illinois to Virginia to see my sister .
#text=I thought it was cool to see what this was like since I always wanted to walk through an airport .
#text=So in the 21 years I have been alive , I have only flown in an airplane twice .
#text=We walked into the airport and went through security and waiting by the section where we would board the plane .
#text=Then we boarded when the flight attendants said the plane was ready .
#text=We put our luggage under our seats and fastened our seat belts .
#text=The flight attendants spoke to everyone on the plane and told us the safety procedures and rules for being on the plane .
#text=We were then towed out to the runway and the plane took off .
#text=I thought it would be a smooth ride , but boy was I wrong !
#text=The plane was so bumpy taking off and the plane was loud .
#text=Then we landed 4 hours later and undid the seat belts and grabbed out stuff and we walked off the plane and out of the airport .
#text=I enjoyed the ride and it was so cool flying thought the clouds and being up so high .
